body:
When it comes to nebula games people either like to farm defend attack or loot up and then attack, post down below what kind of player u are.
I personally don't like to loot up some times I'll farm for my team but not get loot for myself and I don't defend until there is one monument left

title: Do you like to attack, defend, or farm?

replies.body: Personally, I like rushing, since it is what I am best at, and what I enjoy the most.
